page.title: 18Playground games,Fearn.
page.content: In school,we asked pupils about their playground games.The majority of boys preferred playing football.As the playground is small,they only have one goalmouth.The girls preferred games like hopscotch and polo.Other games that are played include go-go-stop,marbles and rounders.We asked pupils who played these games whether they played them often and we found that they were played on a daily basis in most cases.Marbles is becoming more popular again although for a while it was only a few boys who were interested. We used to play rounders but now we can't play because we kept hitting the windows of the school and hitting the ball out onto the road.Many of the younger boys like taking toy cars to school to play with.
